text: The January 2017 Azaz bombing occurred on 7 January 2017 when a car bomb in front of a courthouse and near a market in the rebel-held city of Azaz, Syria detonated, killing at least 60 people, mostly civilians, and wounding around 50 others. The Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant was suspected and blamed for the attack. ==See also== * List of terrorist incidents in January 2017 * 5 September 2016 Syria bombings ==References== Category:2017 murders in Asia Category:ISIL terrorist incidents in Syria Category:January 2017 crimes in Asia Category:January 2017 events in Syria Category:Mass murder in 2017 Category:Mass murder in Syria Category:Suicide bombings in Syria Category:Terrorist incidents in Syria in 2017 Category:Islamic terrorist incidents in 2017 Category:Attacks on buildings and structures in Syria Category:2017 crimes in Syria Category:2010s murders in Syria Category:Explosions in 2017
title: January 2017 Azaz bombing
